name: sake-bot
description: Bot for transmitting Travis CI status updates to upstream repos on GitHub.  You'll need to upload a multi-line private key from your GitHub integration, heroku config:add INTEGRATION_KEY=$(cat private-key.pem)

INTEGRATION_ID.description: The integration ID, can be found by looking in https://github.com/settings/integrations/sake-bot for something like ID 1221 (or whatever you named the integration)
